content.json:
# ü§ñ Auto-Apply with AI - Production Monitoring Dashboard

This dashboard provides comprehensive monitoring for the Auto-Apply automation system, tracking application success rates, browser resource usage, AI screening accuracy, and TheirStack API costs.

---

content.query:
let AutoApplyMetrics = customMetrics
| where timestamp {TimeRange}
| where name startswith "AutoApply."
| extend MetricType = split(name, ".")[1]
| extend MetricName = split(name, ".")[2];

let ApplicationMetrics = AutoApplyMetrics
| where MetricType == "Application"
| summarize 
    TotalApplications = countif(MetricName == "Success"),
    SuccessfulApplications = sumif(value, MetricName == "Success" and value == 1),
    FailedApplications = sumif(value, MetricName == "Success" and value == 0),
    AvgDuration = avgif(value, MetricName == "DurationMs")
| extend SuccessRate = round(SuccessfulApplications * 100.0 / TotalApplications, 1);

let BrowserMetrics = AutoApplyMetrics
| where MetricType == "Browser"
| summarize 
    AvgActiveBrowsers = avgif(value, MetricName == "ActiveCount"),
    MaxQueueLength = maxif(value, MetricName == "Length"),
    AvgMemoryUsage = avgif(value, MetricName == "MemoryMb"),
    AvgLaunchTime = avgif(value, MetricName == "LaunchTimeMs");

let CostMetrics = AutoApplyMetrics
| where MetricType == "TheirStack"
| summarize 
    TotalCreditsUsed = sumif(value, MetricName == "CreditsUsed"),
    TotalCostUSD = sumif(value, MetricName == "CostUSD"),
    AvgResponseTime = avgif(value, MetricName == "ResponseTimeMs");

ApplicationMetrics
| extend 
    ["üìä Total Applications"] = TotalApplications,
    ["‚úÖ Success Rate (%)"] = SuccessRate,
    ["‚ùå Failed Applications"] = FailedApplications,
    ["‚è±Ô∏è Avg Duration (ms)"] = round(AvgDuration, 0)
| project-away TotalApplications, SuccessfulApplications, FailedApplications, AvgDuration, SuccessRate
| union (
    BrowserMetrics
    | extend 
        ["üåê Avg Active Browsers"] = round(AvgActiveBrowsers, 1),
        ["üìà Max Queue Length"] = MaxQueueLength,
        ["üíæ Avg Memory (MB)"] = round(AvgMemoryUsage, 0),
        ["üöÄ Avg Launch Time (ms)"] = round(AvgLaunchTime, 0)
    | project-away AvgActiveBrowsers, MaxQueueLength, AvgMemoryUsage, AvgLaunchTime
)
| union (
    CostMetrics
    | extend 
        ["üí∞ Credits Used"] = TotalCreditsUsed,
        ["üíµ Total Cost (USD)"] = round(TotalCostUSD, 2),
        ["üîÑ Avg API Response (ms)"] = round(AvgResponseTime, 0)
    | project-away TotalCreditsUsed, TotalCostUSD, AvgResponseTime
)
content.title: üéØ Auto-Apply System Overview

content.query:
customEvents
| where timestamp {TimeRange}
| where name in ("AutoApply.Application.Success", "AutoApply.Application.Failed")
| extend Portal = tostring(properties.portal)
| extend Success = iff(name == "AutoApply.Application.Success", 1, 0)
| summarize 
    Applications = count(),
    Successful = sum(Success),
    Failed = sum(1 - Success)
    by Portal
| extend SuccessRate = round(Successful * 100.0 / Applications, 1)
| order by Applications desc
content.title: üìä Application Success Rate by Portal

content.query:
customMetrics
| where timestamp {TimeRange}
| where name == "AutoApply.Application.DurationMs"
| extend Portal = tostring(properties.portal)
| summarize 
    AvgDuration = avg(value),
    P50Duration = percentile(value, 50),
    P95Duration = percentile(value, 95),
    P99Duration = percentile(value, 99)
    by Portal
| project Portal, 
    ["Avg (ms)"] = round(AvgDuration, 0), 
    ["P50 (ms)"] = round(P50Duration, 0),
    ["P95 (ms)"] = round(P95Duration, 0),
    ["P99 (ms)"] = round(P99Duration, 0)
| order by ["Avg (ms)"] desc
content.title: ‚è±Ô∏è Application Duration by Portal

content.query:
customMetrics
| where timestamp {TimeRange}
| where name == "AutoApply.Volume.DailyApplications"
| extend UserId = tostring(properties.userId)
| extend UserTier = tostring(properties.userTier)
| make-series DailyApplications = sum(value) default = 0 on timestamp from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step 1h
| render timechart
content.title: üìà Daily Application Volume Trend

content.query:
customMetrics
| where timestamp {TimeRange}
| where name == "AutoApply.Browser.ActiveCount"
| make-series ActiveBrowsers = avg(value) default = 0 on timestamp from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step 5m
| union (
    customMetrics
    | where timestamp {TimeRange}
    | where name == "AutoApply.Queue.Length"
    | make-series QueueLength = avg(value) default = 0 on timestamp from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step 5m
)
| union (
    customMetrics
    | where timestamp {TimeRange}
    | where name == "AutoApply.Browser.MemoryMb"
    | make-series MemoryUsage = avg(value) default = 0 on timestamp from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step 5m
)
| render timechart
content.title: üåê Browser Resource Usage Trends

content.query:
customMetrics
| where timestamp {TimeRange}
| where name == "AutoApply.Screening.Accuracy"
| extend Portal = tostring(properties.portal)
| extend AccuracyBin = case(
    value >= 90, "90-100%",
    value >= 80, "80-89%", 
    value >= 70, "70-79%",
    value >= 60, "60-69%",
    "<60%"
)
| summarize Count = count() by AccuracyBin
| order by AccuracyBin desc
content.title: üéØ AI Screening Accuracy Distribution

content.query:
customMetrics
| where timestamp {TimeRange}
| where name == "AutoApply.TheirStack.CreditsUsed"
| extend UserId = tostring(properties.userId)
| summarize TotalCredits = sum(value) by bin(timestamp, 1h)
| extend CreditsBudget = 1000 // Monthly budget
| extend UsagePercentage = round(TotalCredits * 100.0 / CreditsBudget, 1)
| project timestamp, TotalCredits, UsagePercentage
| render timechart
content.title: üí∞ TheirStack Credit Usage

content.query:
customMetrics
| where timestamp {TimeRange}
| where name == "AutoApply.TheirStack.CostUSD"
| summarize TotalCostUSD = sum(value) by bin(timestamp, 1h)
| extend MonthlyCostBudget = 100.0 // Monthly budget in USD
| extend CostPercentage = round(TotalCostUSD * 100.0 / MonthlyCostBudget, 1)
| project timestamp, TotalCostUSD, CostPercentage
| render timechart
content.title: üíµ TheirStack API Costs (USD)

content.query:
exceptions
| where timestamp {TimeRange}
| where outerMessage contains "auto-apply" or outerMessage contains "AutoApply" or outerMessage contains "headless"
| extend ErrorType = case(
    outerMessage contains "Browser", "Browser Error",
    outerMessage contains "Timeout", "Timeout Error", 
    outerMessage contains "Network", "Network Error",
    outerMessage contains "Authentication", "Auth Error",
    "Other Error"
)
| summarize ErrorCount = count(), 
    SampleError = any(outerMessage),
    LatestOccurrence = max(timestamp)
    by ErrorType
| order by ErrorCount desc
content.title: ‚ùå Recent Errors & Exceptions

content.query:
customEvents
| where timestamp {TimeRange}
| where name == "AutoApply.Portal.Summary"
| extend Portal = tostring(properties.portal)
| extend Attempts = toint(properties.applicationAttempts)
| extend Successes = toint(properties.successfulApplications)
| extend AverageTime = toint(properties.averageTime)
| extend CommonErrors = tostring(properties.commonErrors)
| summarize 
    TotalAttempts = sum(Attempts),
    TotalSuccesses = sum(Successes),
    AvgTime = avg(AverageTime),
    TopError = any(CommonErrors)
    by Portal
| extend SuccessRate = round(TotalSuccesses * 100.0 / TotalAttempts, 1)
| project 
    Portal,
    ["Total Attempts"] = TotalAttempts,
    ["Success Rate (%)"] = SuccessRate,
    ["Avg Time (ms)"] = round(AvgTime, 0),
    ["Common Error"] = TopError
| order by ["Total Attempts"] desc
content.title: üåê Portal Performance Summary

content.json:
---

## üö® Alert Thresholds

- **Application Success Rate**: Alert if <90% in 15 minutes
- **Browser Failure Rate**: Alert if >5% in 10 minutes  
- **TheirStack Credits**: Alert if >80% monthly usage
- **Queue Length**: Alert if >100 pending applications
- **Function Errors**: Alert on any exceptions in applicationWorker

## üìä KPI Targets

- **Daily Application Volume**: 50-200 applications/day
- **Average Application Duration**: <120 seconds
- **AI Screening Accuracy**: >85%
- **Browser Resource Usage**: <512MB average
- **TheirStack API Response**: <5 seconds average
